message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd be willing to go up to $14,000. I really think this product would be a great fit for me, but I need to be mindful of my expenses.
